description: Comprehensive OpenWRT router monitoring - Network, WiFi, DNS, DHCP, and System metrics

panels.description: Total network traffic on the WAN and wg0 interfaces IN/OUT for 24 hours
panels.title: WAN Network Traffic 24hours

targets.expr: up{instance="openwrt", job="prometheus.scrape.node_exporter"} and (up{instance="openwrt", job="prometheus.scrape.node_exporter"} or vector(0))

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (count by(instance) (count by(cpu, instance) (avg by(instance) (sum by(mode, instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="openwrt", job="prometheus.scrape.node_exporter", mode="idle", instance="openwrt"}[5m]))))) * 100) / count by(instance) (count by(cpu, instance) (node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="openwrt"}))

panels.title: CPU Busy

targets.expr: up{instance=~"openwrt", job="prometheus.scrape.node_exporter"} and (up{instance=~"openwrt", job="prometheus.scrape.node_exporter"} or vector(0))

panels.description:
Network Health is based on a ping data from CollectD against 1.1.1.1. 
If the ping is higher than 50ms, it will turn yellow-ish. If its over 100ms, it will turn red.
panels.title: Network Health

panels.description: Count of how many times in the given range distinct IP addresses were banned to the servers.
panels.title: Banip by Country
DHCP Leases
panels.description: Active DHCP leases on the router

panels.title: DNS Queries Rate
panels.description: DNS queries per second by type

panels.title: WiFi Connected Clients
panels.description: Detailed view of all connected WiFi clients

panels.title: WiFi Client Signal Strength
panels.description: Signal strength per client over time

title: OpenWRT Appliance
